title: [安全|娱乐]Backpacks——背包★插件版更多背包【可自定义&汉化】[1.7.2-1.10.X]
author: 酷车手BB弹
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 19:42 编辑 




介绍：这是一个非常独特背包插件，可让Minecraft服务器中拥有背包这种东西，并且可以自定义。
这款插件用起来非常像是MOD，背包是可以通过合成台来合成
背包是可以扔在地板上的，并且储存在里面的东西永远都不会丢失（真的。。）
简单地说，他是一个纯粹又厉害的东西。

Backpacks is a very unique plugin meant to add backpacks to Minecraft with the use of any client side modifications. Completely vanilla backpacks! This plugin is the first of its kind due to the fact that it adds backpacks as an item! Yes, you can craft backpacks or obtain them through commands. Backpacks can also be dropped on the floor, stored in a chest, or even stored in another backpack and will always retain their inventory. Simply put, its just pure awesome.



特点背包插件支持1.8~1.9（楼主测试可以支持KC端1.7.10&SP端1.10.2）-- 1.8.1-snapshot除外全功能的背包物品--使用这个插件的背包看上去简直就像是一个MOD。他们可以交易，破坏，复制，等等……
不同的背包类型--这个插件的背包有 大 | 小 | 末影 各式各样，甚至联动背包！在未来将增加许多不同的背包，敬请期待:D高度可定制的--背包在每一个方面几乎都是可定制。颜色、大小、名字、lore、制作方法等，所有的都来自恐怖的可视化配置文件。自定义材质--想让玩家能够充分的体验背包吗？发送他们的材质包到你的自定义材质配置选项。（可用材质包）
语言支持-英语不是你的母语吗？这不再重要，因为背包现在支持多种语言！背包是随着西班牙语言文件开箱的。你可以制作你自己的。
自动更新--一旦你下载了背包插件，你再也不用下载新版。每一次新版本发布时，插件都可以自动下载和安装。
?        1.8.X and 1.9.X Support- Backpacks fully supports all 1.8.X and 1.9.X versions except the 1.8.1-SNAPSHOT.
?        Fully functioning backpack item- Backpacks from this plugin are just like backpacks from the mod. They can be traded, destroyed, cloned, etc.
?        Different backpack types- This plugin introduces small, large, ender, crafting, and even linked backpacks! Many different backpacks will be added in the future so stay tuned :D.
?        Highly customizable- Almost every aspect of the backpacks is customizable. The color, size, name, lore, crafting recipe, etc. All from the awesome looking config.
?        Custom Textures- Want players to have the full backpack experience? Send them your own custom resource pack with the custom resource option in the config.
?        Multilingual Support- English not your primary language? This no longer matters because Backpacks now supports multiple languages! Backpacks comes along with the Spanish language file right out of the box. You can make your own though so, the possibilities are endless.
?        Automatic Updates!- Once you download Backpacks, you never have to again. Each time a new version is released, the plugin is downloaded and installed.
 
指令/backpack <player:none>   - 给某玩家指定类型的背包
/givebpkey <player:none>   - 给某玩家背包钥匙（可打开所有背包）
/togglebp <player:none>   - 切换玩家的材质包
/clonebp    - 复制手中的背包
/langbp <language>    - 改变语言文件.
/recoverbp   - 重新获得指定ID和类型的背包.（背包掉岩浆了都能恢复，吊吧）
复制代码
权限backpack.user   - 拥有一般的使用权限（给玩家）.
backpack.admin   - 拥有管理员权限（OP）.
backpack.craft.large   - 制造大背包的权限.
backpack.craft.small   - 制造小背包的权限.
backpack.recover   - 拥有恢复背包的权限（可恢复所有背包，慎给）.
backpack.link   - 允许玩家使用联动背包连接箱子.
复制代码

配置文件#  __________________________________________
# |        Backpacks Configuration           |
# |              by drew6017                 |
# |__________________________________________|
# |              Information:                |
# | - Change the values to that of your      |
# | choosing to edit its properties. You can |
# | find help information about a feature    |
# | in the comment above it.                 |       
# |          【汉化：酷车手BB弹】            |
# |__________________________________________|
version: 0.0.6

# This is the language you want the plugin to be in. Supported languages: English(en), Spanish(sp)
lang: ch

# Enabled this to "true" to send players the custom resource pack from your repository link. This is if you want backpacks to have a texture.
# 设置为true可以让玩家使用自己的材质包
resource-pack: false

# Change this to the link you uploaded your custom resource pack to.
# 改变这个网址，可使用你自己自制的材质包
resource-link: http://example.com/resource-pack.zip

# Supported colors: BLACK, BLUE, YELLOW, RED, ORANGE, PURPLE, WHITE, AQUA, FUCHSIA, MAROON, GREEN, GRAY, SILVER, TEAL, LIME, OLIVE, and NAVY
# 支持的颜色有：BLACK（黑色）, BLUE（蓝色）, YELLO（黄色）, RED（红色）, ORANGE（橙色）, PURPLE（紫色）, WHITE（白色）, AQUA（浅绿色）, FUCHSIA（紫红色）, MAROON（茶色）, GREEN（绿色）, GRAY（灰色）, SILVER（银色）, TEAL（青色）, LIME（黄绿色）, OLIVE（橄榄色）, and NAVY（深蓝色）
# This is the color of the large backpack.
# 这是大背包的颜色
large-color: MAROON

# This is the color of the small backpack.
# 这是小背包的颜色
small-color: BLACK

# This is the color of the crafting backpack.
# 这是工作背包的颜色
craft-color: ORANGE

# This is the color of the ender backpack.
# 这是末影背包的颜色
ender-color: GREEN

# This is the color of the linked backpack.
# 这是联动背包的颜色
linked-color: BLUE

# The name of the "Large Backpack" item. This custom name can NOT contain numbers.
# 大背包的名字，不能出现有数字
large-name: Large Backpack

# The name of the "Small Backpack" item. This custom name can NOT contain numbers.
# 小背包的名字，不能出现有数字
small-name: Small Backpack

# The name of the "Crafting Backpack" item. This name can contain numbers, but if the name is changed, all crafting backpacks made before the change will no longer work.
# 工作背包的名字，不能出现有数字，一但更改了名字，在这之前所做出来的都不能再使用
# Note: This may change in the future.
craft-name: Crafting Backpack

# The name of the "Ender Backpack" item. This name can contain numbers, but if the name is changed, all crafting backpacks made before the change will no longer work.
# 末影背包的名字，不能出现有数字，一但更改了名字，在这之前所做出来的都不能再使用
# Note: This may change in the future.
ender-name: Ender Backpack

# The name of the "Crafting Backpack" item. This name can contain numbers, but if the name is changed, all crafting backpacks made before the change will no longer work.
# 联动背包的名字，不能出现有数字，一但更改了名字，在这之前所做出来的都不能再使用
# Note: This may change in the future.
linked-name: Linked Backpack

# This is the size of the Large Backpack by number of slots. The slots must go by increments of 9 with a maximum integer being 54. (9, 18, 27, 36, 45, 54)
# 这是大背包的格子数量，必须为9的整数！(9, 18, 27, 36, 45, 54)
large-size: 54

# This is the size of the Small Backpack by number of slots. The slots must go by increments of 9 with a maximum integer being 54. (9, 18, 27, 36, 45, 54)
# 这是小背包的格子数量，必须为9的整数！(9, 18, 27, 36, 45, 54)
small-size: 27

# Set this value to "true" to allow players to craft the specified item.
# 设置为true的可让玩家制作他.
large-craft: true
small-craft: true
key-craft: true
craft-craft: true
ender-craft: true
linked-craft: true

# This is the crafting recipe of the large backpack. The recipe is layed out as you would see it in a crafting table. Each symbol represents an item. Use '
 to represent no item.
# 这是大背包的制作方式，使用英文来表示一个格子，使用 $ 表示空出一个格子
# Replace the crafting table slot with the symbol that represents the item you would like to use. List of supported items:
# 可使用的列表：
# Leather Chestplate = a : Leather = b : String = c : Chest = d : Wool = e
# 皮革外套=a ;皮革=b ;线=c ;箱子=d ;羊毛=e 
large-1: bbb
large-2: bdb
large-3: bbb

# This is the crafting recipe of the small backpack. The recipe is layed out as you would see it in a crafting table. Each symbol represents an item. Use '
 to represent no item.
# 这是小背包的制作方式，使用英文来表示一个格子，使用 $ 表示空出一个格子
# Replace the crafting table slot with the symbol that represents the item you would like to use. List of supported items:
# 可使用的列表：
# Leather Chestplate = a : Leather = b : String = c : Chest = d : Wool = e
# 皮革外套=a ;皮革=b ;线=c ;箱子=d ;羊毛=e 
small-1: bbb
small-2: b$b
small-3: bbb

# This is the crafting recipe for the backpack key. The recipe is layed out as you would see it in a crafting table. Each symbol represents an item. Use '
 to represent no item.
# 这是背包钥匙的制作方式，使用英文来表示一个格子，使用 $ 表示空出一个格子
# Replace the crafting table slot with the symbol that represents the item you would like to use. List of supported items:
# 可使用的列表：
# Leather Chestplate = a : Leather = b : String = c : Chest = d : Wool = e : Iron = f : Feather = g
# 皮革外套=a ;皮革=b ;线=c ;箱子=d ;羊毛=e ;铁锭=f ;羽毛=g
key-1: f$f
key-2: $g$
key-3: f$f

# This is the crafting recipe for the backpack key. The recipe is layed out as you would see it in a crafting table. Each symbol represents an item. Use '
 to represent no item.
# 这是末影背包的制作方式，使用英文来表示一个格子，使用 $ 表示空出一个格子
# Replace the crafting table slot with the symbol that represents the item you would like to use. List of supported items:
# 可使用的列表：
# Leather Chestplate = a : Leather = b : String = c : Chest = d : Wool = e : Iron = f : Feather = g : Ender Chest = h
# 皮革外套=a ;皮革=b ;线=c ;箱子=d ;羊毛=e ;铁锭=f ;羽毛=g ;末影箱=h
ender-1: bbb
ender-2: bhb
ender-3: bbb

# This is the crafting recipe for the backpack key. The recipe is layed out as you would see it in a crafting table. Each symbol represents an item. Use '
 to represent no item.
# 这是联动背包的制作方式，使用英文来表示一个格子，使用 $ 表示空出一个格子
# Replace the crafting table slot with the symbol that represents the item you would like to use. List of supported items:
# 可使用的列表：
# Leather Chestplate = a : Leather = b : Blaze Powder = c : Chest = d : Wool = e : Ender Pearl = f : Feather = g : Ender Chest = h
# 皮革外套=a ;皮革=b ;烈焰粉=c ;箱子=d ;羊毛=e ;末影珍珠=f ;羽毛=g ;末影箱=h
linked-1: bcb
linked-2: fdf
linked-3: bcb

# This is the lore of your backpack/key. It can be used to tell users a little about the item.
# 这是背包和钥匙的lore，使用这个可以改变lore
large-lore:
- $7可以装下你一切的东西,是所有背包中最大的!
small-lore:
- $7不是最大的背包,但是比你想象中的要好用.
key-lore:
- $7这是用于打开背包的钥匙.
craft-lore:
- $7可在这个漂亮的背包上工作.
ender-lore:
- $7在世界各地都能进入你的末影箱
- $7来自这个背包.
linked-lore:
- $7通过点击箱子,可以使它与箱子相连
- $7可以在世界各地打开它!

# This is the auto-saving feature for backpacks. You can set all backpacks to be saved periodically so that if the server crashes, players will not loose everything. Time is in minutes.
# 自动保存背包数据，如果服务器崩溃了也不会造成数据丢失，单位是分钟
auto-save: true
save-time: 10

# This tells whether or not to you want backpacks to obtain damage when a player is hit while wearing one.
# 当穿上去后受到攻击是否允许耐久度下降
allowDamage: false

# Having this enabled allows the plugin to automatically update itself when the latest version is released. This is HIGHLY recommended.
# 自动更新（若出现报错请关闭）
autoupdate: true复制代码




默认的合成配方Backpack Key（背包钥匙）Small Backpack（小背包）Large Backpack（大背包）Crafting Backpack（工作背包）Ender Backpack（末影背包）Linked Backpack（联动背包）
图片展示
楼主的视频教程&展示~打字稍慢请见谅http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMTY1NzQxODU1Ng==.html
测试端：1.7.10KCauldron
BUG
联动背包可能有着能打开别人箱子的BUG建议在配置文件中将他禁止掉
-小技巧如何利用这个插件创造出服务器的新玩法呢？因为编号一样的背包都是相连的因此只要OP对其中一个序号的背包一直复制，然后服务器里每人派发一个然后可以开始抢福利了OP打开大背包，里面那么多个格子，随便找一个格子，东西一放估计抢疯了2333

更新日志Update Log (0.1.3)
? Minor changes to the auto-updating system.
Update Log (0.1.2)

? Full support for spigot 1.8.7.
Update Log (0.1.1)

? Small changes to the auto-update system.
Update Log (0.1.0)

? Configuration option to disable auto updating for all of those offline servers out there.
Update Log (0.0.9)

? New backpack! Today I am happy to announce my favorite backpack of all time! The Linked Backpack! This backpack is unlike any other in the fact that you can link it to any chest that is placed on the ground.
? New permission! backpack.link which allows you to link a backpack to a chest. Players have access to this permission by default.
? Various small changes and improvements not worth mentioning.
Update Log (0.0.8)

? Minor improvements and a field test of the new auto update system.
Update Log (0.0.7)

? Automatic updates! Never have to go to this page again to update!
Update Log (0.0.6)

? New backpack! The Ender Backpack! You can now access your enderchest from anywhere in the world with this rocking backpack.
? Major bug fix with the language file. You now no longer have to delete your language file when updating the plugin.
Update Log (0.0.5)

? You can now recover lost backpacks that you accidentally dropped in lava or lost in some other way.
? New command! /recoverbp. Recover your long lost backpacks with this useful command.
? New permission! backpack.recover to control the new command /recoverbp
Update Log (0.0.4)

? New config option! allowDamage
? You can now disabled backpacks ability to take damage by changing this config option. Backpacks taking damage is now disabled by default.
? Full support for all 1.8.X versions!
Update Log (0.0.3)

? Minor bug fixes with error messages in the console when players put leather armor on an armor stand.
Update Log (0.0.2)

? Added multilingual support and a pre-made language file for Spanish.
? Added the ability to customize almost every message that can be sent to users. This can be done by editing the language file.
* Bug fixes and other optimizations.

replies.author: 酷车手BB弹

replies.author: linziqun
replies.txt_content: 如何设置大背包和合成背包让VIP制作呢？还有那个万一玩家的背包不见了东西也就在背包里面没有了？不跟帐号同步吗？这样子岂不是无限背包吗？比如 小背包，我身上带了2个小背包然后穿一个上去放东西进去 然后卸下来穿另一个 ，那另一个里面是不会有东西还是跟上一个一样放着原来的东西，相当于同步帐号。

replies.author: 酷车手BB弹
replies.txt_content:
linziqun 发表于 2016-8-14 05:18
如何设置大背包和合成背包让VIP制作呢？还有那个万一玩家的背包不见了东西也就在背包里面没有了？不跟帐号 ...
请看视频，都有测试
我里面也说了，只要不是操作后台文件，背包里的物品是不可能丢失的
即使背包不见了，OP有权恢复不见的背包
至于如何设置大背包和合成背包让VIP制作
就单独把制造大背包的权限VIP组就好了backpack.craft.large   - 制造大背包的权限.复制代码
每次打开都要穿上衣服好麻烦
